structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Failure Of Sheriff To Pay Fines Or Forfeitures Of Escaped Prisoner; Remedy
law.text: If a sheriff neglects to make such payment for thirty days, the state treasurer shall recover of him in contract the amount of such fines, forfeitures and forfeited recognizances, with interest at the rate of twelve per cent from the time he is held to have received the same and costs.
